title: Know Why Experts Choose Logarithmic Finance, Chainlink And Stellar | Mint - Mint
content: Know Why Experts Choose Logarithmic Finance, Chainlink And Stellar | Mint  Mint
description: The platform's purpose is to support many blockchain networks, allowing users to raise funds on the platform of their choice. Among them will be Ethereum (ETH), Solana (SOL), Polygon (MATIC), Binance Smart Chain (BNB), Tezos (XTZ), and Avalanche (AVAX).
